backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing a UI change to make instructional text more prominent in GoalsDashboard.tsx.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: List of summarized frontend file purposes including updated prominent instructional text in GoalsDashboard.
frontend/DEVELOPMENT.md: Developer guide outlining prerequisites and steps for local development and deployment.
frontend/env.json: Environment configuration containing the Internet Identity URL.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind styles defining OKLCH color variables, dark mode values, and base styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the Lora font and mounting the React root.
frontend/README.md: Project overview describing features and quick start instructions for the Goals Dashboard app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app rendering the GoalsDashboard and global Toaster.
frontend/src/components/CenteredNotifica: Centered auto‑dismissing notification component with configurable duration.
frontend/src/components/MonthlyCompletio: Large modal handling selfie capture, uploads, memory saving, and celebration flows with camera controls.
frontend/src/components/MonthlyMemorySha: Dropdown with sharing options for monthly memory images including system share, downloads, and social links.
frontend/src/components/MonthlyProgressD: SVG donut component showing monthly progress as a colored circular meter.
frontend/src/components/MonthSelectionMo: Modal for selecting a month using a grid and confirm/cancel actions.
frontend/src/components/YearlySummaryTab: Renders a yearly goals summary table with progress tracking, monthly memories, and celebration modal handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, invalidating queries when the identity changes.
Wraps useCamera to ensure video readiness before captures, managing preview state, events, and cleanup.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context with login, logout, and stored identity restoration logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder exporting nothing for this version’s local-only goal state.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind styles, theme variables, and custom components including styles for summary table checkboxes.
frontend/src/lib/celebrationImageComposi: Builds a composited Polaroid-style selfie image with an overlay badge and includes utilities for loading images and converting files.
frontend/src/lib/monthlyMemoryShare.ts: Provides utilities to share monthly memory images via Web Share API with fallbacks for download, social links, and clipboard copy.
frontend/src/lib/monthlyMemoryStorage.ts: Handles saving, retrieving, clearing, and listing monthly memory images in localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/months.ts: Exports the list of month names and a Month type union.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers.
frontend/src/pages/GoalsDashboard.tsx: Renders the goals dashboard with categorized goal cards, editing, completion toggles, and month assignment features.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugins.
frontend/tsconfig.node.json: TypeScript config for Node-side tooling, including module and resolution settings.
frontend/vite.config.ts: Vite configuration enabling React, environment variables, path aliases, dev server proxy, and build settings.
project_state.json: Defines current project metadata, including features, requests, and state version.
